titles: A paraphrase upon the Psalms of David by George Sandys ; set to new tunes for private devotion and a thorough-base for voice or instrument by Henry Lawes ; and in this edition carefully revised and corrected from many errors which passed in former impressions by John Playford.
author: Sandys, George, 1578-1644.
Lawes, Henry, 1596-1662.
Playford, John, 1623-1686?
publisher: Printed by W. Godbid for A. Roper,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
